text: Engels is a city located in Saratov Oblast, Russia. It was founded in 1747. It's a port connected with Saratov over Volga River with a bridge. It was previously known as Pokrovskaya sloboda (until 1916), Pokrovsk (until 1931-1933). == Twin cities == Engels is a sister city of * Edmond, Oklahoma, United States "Interactive City Directory" . Sister Cities International. Retrieved January 15, 2018. == References == Category:Cities and towns in Saratov Oblast
title: Engels, Saratov Oblast
